metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46858 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** Moodle 4.3 allows/grade/report/grader/index.php?searchvalue= reflected XSS when logged in asa teacher. NOTE: the Moodle Security FAQ link states "Some forms of richcontent [are] used by teachers to enhance their courses ... admins andteachers can post XSS-capable content, but students can not."

criterions.comment: moodle package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
